title: Invisibility
desc:
Post 1900
- For the next 3 turns, you turn Invisible and become immune to targeted effects from other players.
- While invisible, your hand size is hidden as long as it is above 1, and the effects of cards you play are kept secret as long as they only affect yourself; only their color and last digit are shown.
- If you play a card that targets another player, this effect ends instantly.
- Cannot be drawn if the "No secrets" Modifier is active.
